INVALID_EMAIL_LOGIN_CODE: The provided email login code is invalid or has expired.
INVALID_GOOGLE_LOGIN_CODE: The provided Google authorization code is invalid.
INVALID_DISCORD_LOGIN_CODE: The provided Discord authorization code is invalid.
INVALID_GITHUB_LOGIN_CODE: The provided GitHub authorization code is invalid.
INVALID_REFRESH_TOKEN: The provided refresh token is invalid.
EXPIRED_REFRESH_TOKEN: The provided refresh token has expired.
ACCESS_TOKEN_MISSING: Access token is missing from the request.
INVALID_ACCESS_TOKEN: The provided access token is invalid.
